name: Reef Shark

trait.name: Pack Tactics
text: The shark has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the shark's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

trait.name: Water Breathing
text: The shark can breathe only underwater.

action.name: Bite
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

description:
Smaller than giant sharks and hunter sharks, reef sharks inhabit shallow waters and coral reefs, gathering in small packs to hunt. A full-grown specimen measures 6 to 10 feet long.
Source: Monster Manual p. 336, Tomb of Annihilation, Ghosts of Saltmarsh, Explorer's Guide to Wildemount
